submapp.map2d.Map2d.add_true_values¶

Map2d.add_true_values(new_true_values: numpy.ndarray, overwrite: bool = True) → None¶

Add true values to the Map2d

Parameters

  • new_true_values (np.ndarray[float]) – New true_values value

  • overwrite (bool, optional) – Determine whether new_true_values should overwrite the current true_values Defaults to True

Return type

None
